Package org.csstudio.platform.simpledal

Interface Summary
IConnector Represents a connector for a process variable.
IProcessVariableConnectionService A service which can be used for easy access to control system channels.
IProcessVariableValueListener<E> Listener, which can be connected to control system channels using an IProcessVariableConnectionService.
IProcessVariableWriteListener Call-back interface that can be used in asynchronous write operations.
 

Class Summary
ProcessVariableConnectionServiceFactory Factory of ProcessVariableConnectionServices,
ProcessVariableValueAdapter<E> Classical adapter for IProcessVariableValueListener with empty default implementations.
 

Enum Summary
ConnectionState The state of a connection to a PV.
SettableState Enumeration that contain the possible write access levels for control system channels.
ValueType Enumeration of all value types that can be queried via control system channels
 

Exception Summary
ConnectionException
